lead_paragraph: British world road race champion Lizzie Armitstead was cleared on Monday to ride in the Olympics after winning a Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) appeal against a ban for missing three doping tests.

headline.print_headline: Cycling-Armitstead Cleared for Rio After Doping Offence Appeal
headline.main: Cycling-Armitstead Cleared for Rio After Doping Offence Appeal
